text: 7.21: Hos 8.2 naŋga, Mt 21.31 naŋga, Lu 6.46 naŋga, Sɨ 19.13 naŋga, Ro 2.13 naŋga, Je 1.22 naŋga, 1.25Krunavundi sambɨ saŋɨnaŋga yaŋ ambandu, Aru mɨŋga, Aru mɨŋga, vamba ambandu. Hara krunavundi kandɨhaŋɨnɨŋ Gotɨndu tɨwɨyɨ maŋgɨyɨmandɨyu. Kru Yavandak nuŋandɨ pɨhuyɨ kɨyɨ hamandu kuyu taya mɨŋahandɨrɨmandɨ hama, Yavandakɨndu tɨwɨyɨ kɨyɨmandɨ.
